item.title: Home Brewed Power Walls
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nsw8PhDlhSg This project is now at 40kwh of storage with fully configurable BMS from http://www.batrium.com. See it with upgraded safety and planning https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list… ▶▶ The process continues building my Powerwall bigger and better Balancing the pack before installing it before I have a little issue with pixies escaping making some magic white smoke. I have to break off all the little plastic clips so it sits on the mount much better.
